section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Qualified brownfields site" has the meaning stated in § 5-301 of the Economic Development Article.
"Tax" has the meaning stated in § 14-801(c) of this title.

text.section: The governing body of a county or municipal corporation may grant, by law, a tax abatement against the overdue county or municipal corporation property taxes imposed on real property that is designated as a qualified brownfields site.
